channel.title: INtech
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from INtech, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: Back Market and iFixit Want You to Use Your Phone for at Least 5 Years
item.description: Back Market and iFixit are partnering to encourage consumers to keep their phones in service for at least five years—and to pressure manufacturers to ...

item.title: Kia is pitching Americans an affordable EV sedan with EV4 debut
item.description: Kia debuted its 2026 EV4 sedan at the New York International Auto Show on Wednesday, its first global electric sedan and one designed for customers lo...

item.title: Nintendo Switch 2 Backward Compatibility: What You Need to Know
item.description: Bad news for fans of cardboard VR headsets, though.

item.title: Aura Aspen Review (2025): Made for Vertical
item.description: The newest frame in Aura’s lineup has the same aspect ratio as your phone, and you can use it in portrait or landscape orientation.

item.title: 8 Best Beard Trimmers (2025): Full Beards, Hair, Stubble
item.description: These beard tools deliver an excellent trim for all types of facial hair.

item.title: Young People Are Making Up to $36K a Year Renting Their T-Shirts and Speakers
item.description: Rental apps like Pickle and Yoodlize are helping millennials and Gen Z-ers turn their closets and tools into extra cash.
